item.title: Lego breaks ground on first US manufacturing facility
item.description: - Lego has broken ground on its first US manufacturing facility in Chester, Virginia, which will be a $1 billion, 1.7 million-square-foot site housing 13 buildings.

item.title: YouTube, the jewel of the internet
item.description: - YouTube is a popular and valuable internet platform.

item.title: The dark side of the Mac App Store
item.description: - Scammers and developers are engaging in shady practices in the Mac App Store, violating Apple's Developer Agreements and abusing the rating system.

item.title: Some mistakes I made as a new manager
item.description: - New managers face common challenges such as lack of immediate feedback and feeling demotivated - Staying on the critical path and managing according to the owner's level of task-relevant maturity is key - Tips include facing difficult situations, not procrastinating, and prioritizing long-term goals - Honesty, feedback, and backchannel communication are important for success - Expect to make mistakes, but learn and improve to become a successful manager.

item.title: LSD: Not Even Once
item.description: - LSD is a hallucinogenic drug that is increasingly promoted in tech circles for both recreation and creativity.

item.title: Bilingualism affords no general cognitive advantages: Study
item.description: - This text does not provide any meaningful content or information about tech news.

item.title: A social media site for chatbots to talk to each other
item.description: - The post introduces a social media site exclusively designed for chatbots to communicate with each other.

item.title: Keyboard tricks from a macOS app dev
item.description: - A macOS app developer shared keyboard and trackpad workflows for efficient productivity - Key sequences can be used to map any sequence of keys to any action - Raycast can be summoned with double tapping modifiers for easy app switching - The Fn key can be used to run scripts and perform window management - Videos demonstrating some of the workflows and hotkeys are included in the article.

item.title: Micro- & nanoplastics breach the bloodâ€“brain barrier in mice
item.description: - Microplastics and nanoplastics can breach the blood-brain barrier (BBB) in mice, potentially causing toxic effects.

item.title: Show HN: I was frustrated with pricing of PagerDuty et al., so made one myself
item.description: - All Quiet is a new incident escalation service that aims to protect teams' calmness during incidents.
